item.description:
Anyone interested in hiking in the Charles W Ward Reservation this weekend? This place is about 45 mins drive from Boston and if we can get the by 11:00 AM, we can spend a few hours hiking as the weather looks good.

From I-93, take Route 125 north 5 mi. Turn right onto Prospect Road and follow for 0.3 mi. to entrance and parking area on right. From Route I-495, take Route 114 east 1.7 mi. Turn right onto Route 125 south and follow for 1.6 mi. Turn left onto Prospect Road and follow for 0.3 mi. to entrance and parking area (15 cars) on right. (Lat:42.6404 Lon:-71.11221)

 

Based on the responses, we can plan other things too like early dinner.
item.name: Hiking in Charles Ward Reservation
